config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The MAX_WIDTH configuration is used to limit the width of an image in the system. It checks if the image's width exceeds the maximum width specified in the hints and adjusts the width and height accordingly.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The MAX_WIDTH configuration is triggered whenever an image is being processed and its width needs to be adjusted based on the maximum width hint provided.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the MAX_WIDTH configuration option is that it ensures that images do not exceed a certain width limit, which can help in maintaining consistency and preventing images from being displayed in an undesirable way.
